definitions: modern character or quality of thought, expression, or technique

examples.text: when he waxes philosophical, he comes across as a strange mix of nostalgia and modernism

shortDefinitions: modern character or quality of thought or technique

definitions: a style or movement in the arts that aims to break with classical and traditional forms

examples.text: by the post-war period, modernism had become part of art history

shortDefinitions: style or movement in arts that aims to depart significantly from classical and traditional forms

definitions: a movement toward modifying traditional beliefs in accordance with modern ideas, especially in the Roman Catholic Church in the late 19th and early 20th centuries.
shortDefinitions: movement towards modifying traditional beliefs in accordance with modern ideas
